title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti. In a separate pan, cook pancetta. Mix eggs and cheese, then combine with spaghetti and pancetta. Season with pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken. Grill or cook chicken. Prepare sauce with tomatoes and spices, add chicken and cream.
